programme.title: Incredible Tales S8
programme.desc: Sylvia thinks that her husband is involved in an affair. She spends thousands to try and catch her husband red-handed. Her depression goes out of control and she even attempts-suicide. Is death the answer for her? Or will someone who owes her a favor, help her in time?

programme.title: The Good Doctor S3
programme.desc: Dr. Claire Browne and Dr. Shaun Murphy treat a patient with a rare form of dwarfism. Meanwhile, Dr. Morgan Reznick, Dr. Audrey Lim and Dr. Alex Park treat a young man who had both arms torn off in a previous farming accident; and Shaun reacts to an emotional situation.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent S13
programme.desc: Viewers can expect to be amazed by an incredible line-up of acts competing to be crowned this years winner, from comedians and contortionists through to singers and dancers. Once again the judges will be saying yes to the acts that impress and buzzing off the acts that fail to make the mark, with the added excitement of the Golden Buzzer for the acts that have that extra-special something.

programme.title: Open Homes S2
programme.desc: A modern masterpiece in a trendy suburb, a dream coastal home, some kitchen tips and tricks and a home that's as luxurious AND sustainable.

programme.title: Food Notes
programme.desc: Oysters and oyster goodies can be easily found all over Taiwan. Many Taiwanese are even willing to drive long distances to savour oysters at their best. Join us as we head to Taiwan's west coast to learn how oysters are farmed and harvested, and find out more about the island's iconic oyster dishes.

programme.title: Sharks: The Big Five
programme.desc: The ocean has its own Big Five. Featuring great whites, to hammerheads, tigers, bulls and the intimidating whale shark, this is the ultimate shark show. Delve deep into the African waters and discover a new side of these prehistoric predators of the sea, while reconsidering the Hollywood portrayal which has done much to damage the reputation of these gentle creatures.

programme.title: WITZ!
programme.desc: Witz is an educational-adventure series that is set on a magical island. Each week we follow the three fun-loving inhabitants as they embark on a magical mission where they learn new things and explore new places.

programme.title: Bugsville
programme.desc: Bugsville is an entertaining and educational pre-school programme featuring NATALIE, her parents (Mary and Fred) and her friends. The show will feature live action filmed in home sets as well as composited CGI shot in a green screen studio.

programme.title: Zou S3
programme.desc: Join Zou the zebra and his family and friends for more daily adventures of discovery and exploration!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure... and Gigantosaurus, the biggest, fiercest dinosaur, reigns over it all!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S6
programme.desc: Mr Explorer calls Paula to help him capture the totem heads, and to the children's surprise, she agreed. But she actually has a plan to foil the operation. Will they be able to pull off and save the totem heads? The children find an abandoned egg and they tried to help the egg hatch. disagreements arises which lead them to find out a shocking truth!

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: Ollie, Cherry, Sloppy and the Imp are struggling to work as a team. Sloppy thus builds a new robot to help them get a hang of things, but things go south when Poly-GON gets his hands on the robot.

programme.title: Super Wings S5: Super Pets
programme.desc: Jett goes to Toronto, Canada to deliver a knapsack to Kamili, but it turns out the bag isn't for him. It's for his cousin Amon in Tanzania. And when Kamili's internet friends around the world hear about the gift, they want to contribute too. And so, Jett begins an amazing relay delivery to get all the gifts to Amon in Tanzania.

programme.title: The Deep S1
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Madcap, Porcupunk and Orangutank dress up and come knocking on Axel's door, determined to play an evil prank on him! But nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: Mind Blown!
programme.desc: As Singapore hurtles towards a cleaner future with electric vehicles, MindBlown looks at how they differ from petrol or diesel vehicles. And we pose the big question -- can they really save the planet?

programme.title: Time Traveler Luke
programme.desc: Thanks to Theo, Luke gets one last chance to lower Acropolis to the ground, but ends up failing. But in the end, Luke uses his time elevator to push Acropolis down and end Alan's 'New Eden.' Luke uses his own Relic Guardian Badge as the final piece to the Astrolabe to finally complete it...

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: Valt is excited when he gets permission to start a Beyblade club at school, and he names himself the club's captain. His first challenge is to convince the others to join, starting with Rantaro and Ken. But it turns out to be tougher than he thought... Ken won't even consider joining unless he gets to battle Shu!

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore S2
programme.desc: Coffee is a drink that is enjoyed all round the world and it is the key ingredient in many much loved desserts. But for this invention test the contestants must think outside the box and create a savoury coffee flavoured dish as only the winning dish will have a complete recipe in the next round where the home cooks must replicate another incredible dish.

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a different cuisine, showcasing a variety of traditional and modern dishes from each country. Along the way, we join Diana as she explores the local shops, restaurants and markets, providing tips and advice for sourcing ingredients for each dish. Then it's back to her kitchen where Diana cooks up simple but authentic, home-style Asian dishes.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: The Champions
programme.desc: The premise is to round up the winners and/or most notable contestants from seasons 1-13 and have them face off head-to-head to see who is the ultimate America's Got Talent top act. America's Got Talent: The Champions will not just showcase the very best from the U.S. apparently. The show will pull top acts from global versions of the AGT franchise too.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: NINJAGO - Secrets Of The Forbidden Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Series centres on the fictional world of Ninjago, telling the story of a group of teen Ninja and their battles against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends S22
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Planet
programme.desc: Bakugan Battle Planet follows the adventures of Dan and his best friends, the first kids on Earth to bond with the mysterious alien creatures known as Bakugan!

programme.title: Metalions
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Elon, an 8-year-old inventor whose world changes forever when he discovers his role as a protector for the Earth and its environment!

programme.title: Sky Shakers Series
programme.desc: SORA heads over to Uncle Ong's house, Nat, Uncle Ong and Andy trick her. The Spy-Bots are being sent out to find the Cratons. They manage to locate the children and observe them from a distant. The Henchmen prepare to capture the Cratons. Fox has been refusing food and very low on energy and throws up. Andy, Nat and Uncle Ong are worried. The children approaches the SORA Agent separately for help. She agrees. Uncle Ong helps Fox gets a blood transfusion from Spike.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Crimewatch
programme.desc: A robber went to great lengths to conceal his identity to escape with $120,000 worth of stolen jewellery. Watch how officers from CID conducted extensive ground investigations, trawled through more than 200 hours of CCTV footage, and eventually arrested him and his other accomplices within 48 hours. In this episode, learn how to safeguard yourself against scams where scammers would pretend be the victims' friends, and ask for financial assistance from the victims.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Wild Thailand
programme.desc: Go beyond Thailand's beaches. Wild Thailand reveals a sacred kingdom of awe-inspiring beauty. It takes in towering limestone cliffs, paddy fields, hidden temples and the teeming city of Bangkok, before visiting the forests of the north. Each episode is packed with wildlife.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.

programme.desc: In this series, we see hilarious, outrageous and hazardous footage taken directly from streets around the globe. From the motorcyclist who ended up back-flipping off a cliff, to the have-a-go hero who pulled a grandmother out of a burning car.

Will they succeed? Tim is convinced he's a great handyman. His abilities are put the test when he's called upon to cover for Mr. Mechanic who is away on vacation. Will Tim live up to his self proclaimed name, "Mr. Quick Fix?".

But when Jet and Adelaide go on a mission to save their favourite robot, they stumble across a library of hidden Alien artefacts inside a locked room owned by Aubrina - including a mysterious Alien tech cube!

Hot Shot, Whirl, Hoist, Medix and Wedge learn the value of teamwork, courage and friendship as they pass simulated and real rescue challenges. Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

But Leonard and Justin refuse to because they think it should be a police matter.

programme.title: 小娘惹

programme.desc: 对立乔一直默默暗恋的唐雨晨，仍然不离不弃的守在立乔身边，她不忍心看着自己欣赏的立乔一阙不振，决心帮助立乔走出伤痛，重拾信心和欢笑。传之是96度C的常客，在雨晨眼里，他是个不事生产，沉迷上网的现代草莓一族，拥有严重的王子病，喝咖啡却没钱买单。为了还债，他只好接受雨晨的安排，留在96度Café 打工。传之来自富裕问题家庭，因为母亲意外卧病，父亲刘浩仁不甘寂寞与公司职员Ann发展了一段婚外畸恋, 传之为此与浩仁父子冲突离家出走。在96度C, 传之与雨晨相处的过程，发现自己爱上雨晨。他深知立乔封闭的心开始接受雨晨的感情，决定默默隐藏起感情，成全守候着雨晨。演员:陈泂江饰徐立乔;陈欣淇饰唐雨晨;陈罗密欧饰唐伟大;方伟杰饰刘传.

programme.title: 96oC咖啡 (连续剧) (PG)
programme.desc: 对立乔一直默默暗恋的唐雨晨，仍然不离不弃的守在立乔身边，她不忍心看着自己欣赏的立乔一阙不振，决心帮助立乔走出伤痛，重拾信心和欢笑。传之是96度C的常客，在雨晨眼里，他是个不事生产，沉迷上网的现代草莓一族，拥有严重的王子病，喝咖啡却没钱买单。为了还债，他只好接受雨晨的安排，留在96度Café 打工。传之来自富裕问题家庭，因为母亲意外卧病，父亲刘浩仁不甘寂寞与公司职员Ann发展了一段婚外畸恋, 传之为此与浩仁父子冲突离家出走。在96度C, 传之与雨晨相处的过程，发现自己爱上雨晨。他深知立乔封闭的心开始接受雨晨的感情，决定默默隐藏起感情，成全守候着雨晨。演员:陈泂江饰徐立乔;陈欣淇饰唐雨晨;陈罗密欧饰唐伟大;方伟杰饰刘传.

programme.title: 小小超人趣旅游
programme.desc: 这一集，小小超人来到位于马来西亚霹雳州的人猿保育中心，向志工学习如何从事与人猿保育有关的活动。小朋友将动手为人猿准备食物和喂食人猿、进行丰容工作、清理园区，最后，担任兽医的小帮手，为人猿进行身体检查.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦
programme.desc: 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题.

programme.title: 历历在目
programme.desc: 你可知道端午节的由来？有什么传说？端午节吃粽子有些什么有趣的说法？赛龙舟和端午节又有什么关系？除了水上龙舟，新加坡还有有趣的旱龙舟活动，这是怎么一回事？这一集，一起去了解华族传统节日端午节背后的故事.

programme.title: 熊出没之探险日记 S2
programme.desc: 《熊出没之探险日记2》讲述了光头强、熊大、熊二和赵琳在寻虎探险之旅结束后，狗熊岭成立了自然保护区，成为了闻名动物界的天堂，黑风、蕾蒂、嘎嘎等马戏团老友们通过熊大的信也来到保护区开始了新的生活.

programme.title: 一起轻旅行
programme.desc: “一起轻旅行” 将带观众到台湾的各个角落，寻找正宗古早味的美食.

programme.title: 空中访民情
programme.desc: 冠病疫情打乱了国人的生活常态，各行各业面对重重挑战，大家得和冠病共存。《空中访民情 2021》系列，将邀请各政府部门的部长和不同领域的嘉宾，一起讨论在疫情新常态下，大家关心的课题。其中，包括工作与经济、社会的数码包容性和如何与冠病共存。部长也将在节目中回应从社交媒体和街头访问所收集到的民众反馈.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺
programme.desc: 这个深受乐龄人士喜爱的节目宗旨是让喜爱歌唱的乐龄人士展现歌喉，提供实现梦想的舞台，让参赛者尽情挥洒.

programme.title: 生活在这里
programme.desc: 《生活在这里》是一个具震撼力的资讯节目系列。主持人每集将锁定一个地方群体，勇闯他们令人侧目的生活居所与险峻地带，了解他们如何经历风霜，在艰辛的环境条件下，求存求安定的故事。这个星期，林明伦将带我们到印尼的海上游牧部落去一探究竟.

programme.title: 生产者
programme.desc: 这个节目将带您了解马来西亚食品的起源，捕捉当地制造企业的经营方式，生存和克服问题的方式.

programme.title: 你在说什么？
programme.desc: 新组合驾到！初来乍到的网红俊良和玮玲就得面对高难度主题—烹煮中药药膳汤的考验。面对艰涩难懂的词汇和令人混淆的中药材，两人如何在小老师的帮助下，完成药膳汤的烹煮？哪一组所熬煮出来的药膳汤，更为评审团所接受.

programme.title: 祖先保佑2
programme.desc: 赛鼎找到喜记店面，大家紧锣密鼓地筹备。学庚感叹要不是大喜启发他做饼，大家也不会创办喜记。大喜根本没想过自己会是喜记的创办人之一。中秋节，喜记开张，生意一片兴旺。大喜趁着众人庆祝之际，悄悄离开，来到河边，春仙赶来送行…….

programme.title: 祖先保佑2
programme.desc: 大喜回返现代，成功化解喜记的危机。欧阳璇也因为大喜从1918年带回来的生子秘方而成功怀了龙凤胎。大喜巧遇Luna，欧阳璇见她和大喜相谈甚欢，有些醋意。大喜忙解释Luna是救了他的人，并和老嬷长得很像，欧阳璇将信将疑.

programme.title: 春花望露

programme.title: Go Go 台湾 II

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 燕珠考虑接纳汉洁，但一看到汉洁就想到绍源跟初恋女友的感情，所以自然而然地讨厌汉洁。汉洁虽然不知道燕珠为何不喜欢她，却重复地向燕珠道歉，令燕珠觉得很心疼.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 爱莉想介入太阳和露莉的感情，所以故意搞砸他们的约会，令露莉以为太阳真的变心了，很伤心。太阳拿出项链送给露莉，并向她保证自己没有喜欢上别人.

programme.title: 捉迷藏
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 恩赫把素拉带到他的住所跟彩琳见面。素拉以为彩琳要对付她，岂料彩琳却说她需要素拉的帮助，两人才能一起活命.

programme.title: 捉迷藏
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 彩琳在泰山召开高层会议宣布让载尚成为会长前，让泰山知道载尚侵占公款，并筹集秘密资金。若向有关当局呈报，载尚和泰山集团都会毁于一旦。泰山跟彩琳做交易，把太平洋化妆品的股份还给闵家，并同意让彩琳跟载尚离婚.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 S1

programme.title: 地球那一边
programme.desc: (重) 外蒙古游牧民族饲养了约4000万头牲畜，其中包括了牛、羊、骆驼、驴和马等等。牧民逢冬会展开好几百公里的迁徙，历经风险寻找栖息地，确保牲畜活命。主持人李心钰将跟着一家牧民穿越戈壁沙漠，寻找过冬的绿洲。.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 世娜照胜赫的指示到洁姿美妆偷拍产品设计图，行径被佳英录下来。世娜与合作人见面，将设计图交给对方的同时被警方逮捕。.

programme.title: 罪孽牢笼
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/泰) 阿月数晚都梦见自己的婆婆跟她索命。原来阿月早期受不了婆婆的凌辱，把自己的婆婆害死。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 报纸上刊登爱罗受访时的照片。珊荷的母亲白琴熙认出爱罗身上项链的样式，和秀浩被抛弃时身上戴的一样，怀疑爱罗就是秀浩的生母。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩) 秀浩收到了奥娜集团会长夫人千纯林送的胸针礼物，意外发现自己竟是朴家的孩子。.

programme.title: 地球的庆典
programme.desc: (PG) 我的欧洲之旅，这一集来到了卢森堡！相信大家听说过，这是一个非常小但是非常有钱的国家喔～被法国、德国、比利时三国包围，总面积只比台北市大一点点。虽然卢森堡三个国字是从英文Luxembourg直翻过来，但这个名字翻得非常的好！因为这个国家虽然小，但有非常美丽的森林和非常多的城堡！很多人都只是顺路经过所以玩一下，但其实他也是一个很有特色的国家哦！就让我带大家，来参观一​​下吧！跟着庆典去旅行~.

programme.title: 我的爱丽丝
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩) 度妍对泰伊消失的事情产生好奇，而泰伊却因为非法穿越时间旅行，身上出现了被虫洞辐射的湿疹。敏赫终于知道自己的儿子是镇谦后，内心对他充满愧疚。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 S4
programme.desc: (重) 介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事。.

programme.title: 十大新加坡
programme.desc: (重) 新传媒艺人姚彣隆曾是月光族？而多栖发展艺人黄靖伦也曾借钱度日？有人说，新加坡人有钱没钱多少都背负着债务，这是真的吗？究竟是什么原因让新加坡人负债？这集的《10大新加坡》就要探讨新加坡人欠债的原因！.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 世娜煽动洁姿美妆代理店的店长们，指佳英不赞成洁姿美妆跟YB化妆品进行企业合并就会导致洁姿美妆走向倒闭。代理店的店长们和公司职员都觉得佳英在影响公司的发展，要佳英离开公司。.

programme.title: 罪孽牢笼
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/泰) 众人看到宋迪大师为阿月解蛊。仪式结束后，大家开始唾弃蕾奴。蕾奴无法待在春森县，彻夜离开。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 秀浩和纯林的孙子朴道京搭上张艾丝特的车，途中出了车祸，道京身亡，秀浩昏迷不醒。艾丝特秘密找人帮忙，将秀浩的脸整形成道京的模样。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 被当成道京的秀浩昏迷了五年仍然没有醒过来。朴会长决定紧急召开理事会，让金南俊担任代表理事一职。.

programme.title: 生活达人 S13
programme.desc: (双声道-中/韩) 本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 我的爱丽丝
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/韩) 敏赫去见李世勋时碰到他遇害，还没来得及查案，镇谦就到了。镇谦误以为敏赫是凶手，两人大打出手。敏赫逃走后，因怀疑诗英是凶手，于是回到未来爱丽丝营地找她。.

programme.title: 中餐厅 S2
programme.desc: 节目由5位青春合伙人苏有朋、赵薇、舒淇、王俊凯、白举纲, 通过20天的时间，从零开始经营一家位于法国科尔马小镇的中餐厅，互相协作并彼此关心和学习，在中餐厅内做出中国的味道.

programme.title: 地球的庆典
programme.desc: 我的欧洲之旅，这一集来到了卢森堡！相信大家听说过，这是一个非常小但是非常有钱的国家喔～被法国、德国、比利时三国包围，总面积只比台北市大一点点。虽然卢森堡三个国字是从英文Luxembourg直翻过来，但这个名字翻得非常的好！因为这个国家虽然小，但有非常美丽的森林和非常多的城堡！很多人都只是顺路经过所以玩一下，但其实他也是一个很有特色的国家哦！就让我带大家，来参观一​​下吧！跟着庆典去旅行.

programme.title: 特别的食物给特别的你
programme.desc: 在台湾，前囚犯被友善的称为更生人；前囚犯当中，以前嗜毒者最难感化，也遭受更大的歧视。艺人陈邦鋆到台北一家安置了从老到少戒毒者的有机农场，了解戒毒者的戒毒经历，以及他们为重返社会尽心竭力的故事.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: 燕珠深爱着绍源，所以决定跟他走。春玉惊讶，告诉燕珠她一定无法照顾他人的孩子，也一定没有办法适应没有钱的生活。春玉说若燕珠一旦离开她身边，就不会原谅燕珠。燕珠哭着离家.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: 春玉告诉绍源她在40年前把年幼的继子弄丢之后就一直活在悔恨中。她了解燕珠，知道燕珠跟她一样，无法真心地抚养他人的孩子。春玉不希望燕珠步她的后尘，希望绍源跟燕珠分手.

programme.title: 捉迷藏
programme.desc: 彩琳到贤淑的小吃店试探贤淑，发现妍珠真的可能是秀雅。彩琳想通过公司的国外培训计划引妍珠出国。贤淑看到妍珠被惠琴无理对待，不想她继续当海兰的秘书，所以支持妍珠出国进修.

programme.title: 捉迷藏
programme.desc: 弼斗在机场找到妍珠，跟她说当年共同绑架她的是贤淑。妍珠为了查明她的身世，没有出国.

programme.title: 中国达人秀 S6
programme.desc: 来自全中国各省份的达人们将一一上台施展他们的浑身解数，并且看他们的表演是否能夺得观众及四位观察员的认可.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 S1
programme.desc: 全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法.

programme.desc: Ep 21: 国王因阿畅的煽风点火，再收到阿贵希望国王释放兰庭的请求下，罚阿贵监禁思过。阿畅趁机强行把婉通带回家。Ep 22: 楂姆席大人欲接婉通母子离开。婉通因阿畅威胁杀害帮助她的人而拒绝离开。婉通请璀汀和阿雅传信给阿贵也被阿畅掉包.
